mil7.2.8:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘capassa ekam angam gahetabban’ti yam vadesi, katamam tam ekam angam gahetabban”ti?
mil7.2.8:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, capo sutacchito namito yavaggamulam samakameva anunamati nappatitthambhati;
mil7.2.8:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena theranavamajjhimasamakesu anunamitabbam nappatipharitabbam.
mil7.2.8:1.4: Idam, maharaja, capassa ekam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.2.8:1.5: Bhasitampetam, maharaja, bhagavata devatidevena vidhura (punnaka) jatake—
